column1: Great reminder from my friend French Hill to donate blood if you are able. Contact @ArkRedCross or @ABIblood to find the nearest donation center near you and make an appointment. It’s needed urgently. THANK YOU to those helping meet this need or serving in other ways. #COVID19Ark https://t.co/8O8pgIolW9

Blood donations🩸are still needed even amid the #COVID19 crisis. If you’re healthy & able please consider giving blood. It can help save lives.  RT to get the word out. We’re in this together and I know Arkansans will continue to serve each other well - as we always do. #arnews https://t.co/VMqaVj1tY7
